title: ResumAI
description: ResumAI leverages LLMs to generate, analyze, and optimize resumes for job seekers. Features include PDF export, keyword matching, and recruiter feedback simulation.

title: ASL Interpreter
summary: Real-time American Sign Language recognition app.
description: A web app that uses TensorFlow.js and a webcam to interpret ASL gestures into text and speech, making communication more accessible.

title: Flight Delay Prediction
summary: ML pipeline for predicting flight delays.
description: End-to-end ML pipeline using PySpark and Airflow to predict flight delays based on weather, airline, and historical data. Includes dashboards and REST API.

title: All-In Casino
description: A provably fair, on-chain casino with games like Poker and Blackjack. Built with Solidity, React, and Chainlink VRF for randomness.

title: LLM Hardware Optimizer
summary: Accelerating LLM inference on custom hardware.
description: Research project optimizing transformer inference on FPGAs and GPUs. Achieved 2x speedup for BERT and GPT models using quantization and custom kernels.

title: DSP Algorithm Suite
description: A library of digital signal processing algorithms (FFT, filters, modulation) with interactive visualizations and real-time audio demos.

title: Blockchain Voting
description: A blockchain-based voting system ensuring transparency, privacy, and auditability. Used in university elections with 1,000+ votes cast.

title: MLOps Dashboard
summary: Monitor and manage ML pipelines at scale.
description: A dashboard for tracking ML experiments, deployments, and metrics. Integrates with MLflow, Kubernetes, and Prometheus.

title: Streaming Data Pipeline
description: A scalable pipeline for ingesting, processing, and visualizing streaming data using PySpark, Kafka, and D3.js.

title: Portfolio v1
summary: First iteration of my developer portfolio.
description: A classic portfolio site built with Gatsby and styled-components. Showcases early projects and blog posts.

title: Algorithm Visualizer
description: A web app to visualize sorting, pathfinding, and graph algorithms step-by-step. Used in university CS courses.

title: LLM Chatbot
description: A chatbot powered by GPT-4, with context memory and custom persona support. Deployed on Vercel with serverless functions.

title: Airbnb Clone
description: A feature-rich Airbnb clone with authentication, booking, and payment integration. Built with Next.js, Prisma, and Stripe.

title: Stock Screener
summary: Screen and analyze stocks in real time.
description: A stock screener app with real-time data, technical indicators, and custom filters. Built with React, D3.js, and WebSockets.

title: Personal Finance Tracker
description: A personal finance app to track expenses, set budgets, and visualize spending trends. Uses local storage and D3.js charts.
